description: This file defines an interface and a class for managing notes in a mobile application, interfacing with a SQLite database to perform CRUD operations.

classes.name: INotesRepository
classes.description: An abstract class that defines the contract for note CRUD operations.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of INotesRepository using SQLite for data persistence.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Fetches all notes ordered by last update timestamp.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns the note with its assigned ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database based on its ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by its ID.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, returning null if not found.
